sentences.en: And crying havoc on the slug and snail.
sentences.cn: 象蜗牛、鼻涕虫发出毁灭的警告.

sentences.en: Blast your way through the all - new action packed Metal Slug Mobile 3.
sentences.cn: 用火力打通这全新包装的动作游戏-合金弹头3.

sentences.en: But sea slug goes about It'slightly differently.
sentences.cn: 但是海洋鼻涕虫获得营养物质的方法略有不同.

sentences.en: Edgar took a slug of his drink.
Fabrizzio handed him a wine bottle and Michael took; % long slug.
sentences.cn: 法布里吉奥递给迈克尔一瓶葡萄酒,迈克尔接过来, 大口大口地喝了个痛快.

sentences.en: He took another slug of whisky.
I raised a fist to slug Eddie.
Ken took a long slug of scotch.
sentences.cn: 肯喝了一大口苏格兰威士忌酒.

sentences.en: Make a run, gotta him, bust a slug on his chin.
sentences.cn: 赶紧逃跑, 顺便给他下腭一拳.

sentences.en: The newspaper put a copyright slug over her story.
sentences.cn: 报纸在她的报道上方标上版权所有的星号.

sentences.en: The OED says this form of slug a slang usage, not tracing the origin.
sentences.cn: 《牛津英语词典》写道,slug此种用法属于俚语, 不能倒推回词源.

sentences.en: The slug of tracer is added to the stream in an undefined manner.
sentences.cn: 示踪剂液滴以不确定的方式注入流注里.

sentences.en: The small garden slug can stretch its body to enter worm holes.
sentences.cn: 渺小的庭院蛞蝓能把身体伸长而钻进虫子洞里.

sentences.en: Unable to negotiate, they began to slug it out in the media.
sentences.cn: 谈判不成, 他们便开始通过舆论工具来一决胜负.

sentences.en: Wavelike slug - flow is a representative flow type in horizontal pneumatic conveying.
sentences.cn: 波状栓塞流是气力输送中的一种典型流型.

words.tran_cn: 萧条的；迟钝的；行动迟缓的；懒惰的
打击力强的选手；重击者

trans.tran_cn: 子弹，金属块，鼻涕虫，动作缓慢的人，[物]斯勒格，斯（质量单位）
trans.tran_en: a small creature with a soft body, that moves very slowly and eats garden plants
to hit someone hard with your closed hand
